statsview.desc: I was interested how many games of each sport I watched and I wanted a summary like Spotify wrapped. Then I maked Statsview. This project counts how many matches user watched in the year or season and show user's summary on the end of season/year.

taskmgm.desc: On first look it looks like normal task manager, but it isn't. In this manager you have to take care a pet, feed him. Also you have your own days streak when you dane some task each day in a row. Shop can help you feed your pet or take back your streak for a fee. Some tasks can't be deleted, because it has high importance, but can be deleted for a small fee. It's simple task manager but maked in different way.

mini.heading: Mini projects
mini.desc: This projects are generally for backend. Their look isn't important, because they were for learn how to work with api, events etc.
mini.crypto: It is a simple market of crypto to track their week value. There are top 10 the most valuable crypto and when you click on some, then show his week chart. You also can calculate how many Bitcons can you buy after enter PLN.
mini.travel: It is simple travel goals app. You can see some info about any place and add a place to goals list. Also you can add note to your trip goals.
